# Possible Weapon, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] \[[[Chaotic Spells|chaotic]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, V

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One object

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower website

The weapon touched shimmers with ghostly afterimages of possible moves and strikes, fading off into infinity. When using this weapon, make 2 attack rolls and choose which result to apply. Because neither outcome is truly real, however, you do only half normal damage.
